name: Executive Ballpoint Pen
description: Elegant ballpoint pen with a sleek design, perfect for professional settings.

name: Professional Notebooks Set
description: Set of high-quality notebooks with durable covers, ideal for taking notes during meetings or conferences.

name: Staple Remover
description: Handheld staple remover for quickly and easily removing staples from documents without damaging the paper.

name: Desktop File Organizer
description: Sturdy desktop file organizer with multiple compartments for sorting and storing documents, folders, and files.

name: Electric Pencil Sharpener
description: Electric pencil sharpener with a powerful motor for fast and efficient sharpening of pencils.

name: Professional Binder Set
description: Set of professional binders with clear overlay pockets for customizable covers and spine labels.

name: Desk Lamp
description: Adjustable desk lamp with multiple brightness levels and a flexible gooseneck for directing light where needed.

name: Desktop Calendar
description: Desktop calendar with monthly and weekly views, perfect for keeping track of appointments, deadlines, and meetings.
